member.name: T:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge
member.summary: Allows for control over OBS through it's websocket server.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnRecordStateChanged
member.summary: Called when the recording state of OBS changes.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnReplayBufferSaved
member.summary: Called when the replay buffer is saved in OBS.

member.summary: Called when the replay buffer state of OBS changes.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnStreamStateChanged
member.summary: Called when the streaming state of OBS changes.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnSceneChanged
member.summary: Called when the current scene in OBS changes.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnSceneCreated
member.summary: Called when a new scene is created in OBS.

member.summary: Called when the virtual cam state of OBS changes.

member.name: F:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.OnSceneRemoved
member.summary: Called when a scene is removed in OBS.

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.GetScenes
member.summary: Get a list of all scenes in the current OBS profile.

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.SetScene(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the active scene in OBS to the specified scene.
member.param: The name of the scene to change to

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsConnected
member.summary: Check if OBS websocket is connected.
member.returns: True if connected, false if disconnected

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsRecording
member.summary: Get the recording status of OBS.
member.returns: True if recording, false if not recording

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsRecordingPaused
member.summary: Gets the recording paused status of OBS.
member.returns: True if recording is paused, false if not paused

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsStreaming
member.summary: Get the streaming status of OBS.
member.returns: True if stremaing, false if not streaming

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsReplayBufferActive
member.summary: Get the replay buffer status of OBS.
member.returns: True if active, false if inactive

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.IsVirtualCamActive
member.summary: Get the virtual cam status of OBS.
member.returns: True if active, false if inactive

member.summary: Start recording in OBS.

member.summary: Pauses recording in OBS.

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.ResumeRecording
member.summary: Resumes recording in OBS.

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.StopRecording
member.summary: Stops recording in OBS.

member.summary: Starts streaming in OBS.

member.name: M:WeatherElectric.OBSControl.OBS.ObsBridge.StopStreaming
member.summary: Stops streaming in OBS.
